commit.message:
Fix #14393

String patterns should have a single constructor of arity 0.

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,17 @@

+
+fn main() {
+    match ("", 1u) {
+        (_, 42u) => (),
+        ("", _) => (),
+        _ => ()
+    }
+}
